author: dims
msg: Improve performance of SimpleAxisServer for more stringent testing in a multi-threaded environment.
- Start a new thread in SimpleAxisServer for each client socket.
- Extract code from SimpleAxisServer into SimpleAxisWorker
The success ratio of MultithreadTestCase jumped from ~205/400 to ~320/400 on both JDK13 and JDK14

author: tomj
msg: Turn off skeleton generation for the interop tests.
NOTE: The WSDL generated from skeletons includes the
getOperationDesc APIs, which should be filtered out.

author: dims
msg: remove(1) throws NullPointerExceptions under heavy load.

author: dims
msg: Strengthen the if conditions to avoid possible problems.
